using System;
namespace MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks
{
    public partial class MyDTO
    {
        private const int BlockSize = 24;
        private readonly Memory<byte> _block;
        public ReadOnlyMemory<byte> Block => _block;
        public MyDTO() => _block = new byte[BlockSize];
        public MyDTO(ReadOnlySpan<byte> source) => _block = source.Slice(0, BlockSize).ToArray();
        // <field-map>
        //  Pos.  Len.  Type        Endian  Name
        //  ----  ----  --------    ------  --------
        //     0     8  Double      Little  Field1
        //     8     1  Boolean     Little  Field2
        //    16     8  Int64       Little  Field3
        // </field-map>
        public Int64 Field3
        {
            get => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Int64_LE.Instance.ReadFrom(_block.Slice(0, 0).Span);
            set => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Int64_LE.Instance.WriteTo(_block.Slice(0, 0).Span, value);
        }
        public Boolean Field2
        {
            get => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Boolean_LE.Instance.ReadFrom(_block.Slice(0, 0).Span);
            set => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Boolean_LE.Instance.WriteTo(_block.Slice(0, 0).Span, value);
        }
        public Double Field1
        {
            get => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Double_LE.Instance.ReadFrom(_block.Slice(0, 0).Span);
            set => DTOMaker.Runtime.Codec_Double_LE.Instance.WriteTo(_block.Slice(0, 0).Span, value);
        }
    }
